trans-unit.source: Data access
trans-unit.target: Data access

trans-unit.source: Data access in Azure Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Data access in Azure Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section provide information about accessing and changing app data stored in <token>firstref_zumo</token>.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section provide information about accessing and changing app data stored in <token>firstref_zumo</token>.

trans-unit.source: This same content is available as help in the <token>firstref_azportal</token>.
trans-unit.target: This same content is available as help in the <token>firstref_azportal</token>.

trans-unit.source: For more general information about <token>nextref_zumo</token> and examples of how to use <token>nextref_zumo</token> in your apps, see <externalLink><linkText>Mobile Services Tutorials and Resources</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=266220</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more general information about <token>nextref_zumo</token> and examples of how to use <token>nextref_zumo</token> in your apps, see <externalLink><linkText>Mobile Services Tutorials and Resources</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=266220</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.target: In this section

trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Work with data
trans-unit.target: Work with data

trans-unit.target: Describes how to use <token>nextref_zumo</token> to store app data.

trans-unit.target: Create a table

trans-unit.target: Describes considerations for using dynamic schema for tables.

trans-unit.target: Browse records

trans-unit.target: Describes options for managing columns in a table.

trans-unit.target: System columns
